info.title: Azure Media Services
info.description: Streaming resource management client for Azure Media Services

get.description: Lists the Live Events in the account.

default.description: The streaming error response describing why the operation failed.
The streaming error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.description: Live Event properties needed for creation.

fragmentsPerTsSegment.description: The amount of fragments per HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) segment.

description.description: The description of the Live Output.

archiveWindowLength.description: ISO 8601 timespan duration of the archive window length. This is duration that customer want to retain the recorded content.

created.description: The exact time the Live Output was created.

lastModified.description: The exact time the Live Output was last modified.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Live Output.

resourceState.description: The resource state of the Live Output.

LiveOutputProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties required to create a Live Output.

value.description: The result of the List Live Output operation.

@odata.nextLink.description: Th link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of Live Outputs.

streamingProtocol.description: The streaming protocol for the Live Event.

keyFrameIntervalDuration.description: ISO 8601 timespan duration of the key frame interval duration.

endpoints.description: The input endpoints for the Live Event.

name.description: The friendly name for the IP address range.

subnetPrefixLength.description: The subnet mask prefix length (see CIDR notation).

IPRange.description: The IP address range in the CIDR scheme.

LiveEventPreviewAccessControl.description: The IP access control for Live Event preview.

accessControl.description: The access control for LiveEvent preview.

streamingPolicyName.description: The name of streaming policy used for LiveEvent preview

alternativeMediaId.description: An Alternative Media Identifier associated with the preview url.  This identifier can be used to distinguish the preview of different live events for authorization purposes in the CustomLicenseAcquisitionUrlTemplate or the CustomKeyAcquisitionUrlTemplate of the StreamingPolicy specified in the StreamingPolicyName field.

encodingType.description: The encoding type for Live Event.

clientAccessPolicy.description: The content of clientaccesspolicy.xml used by Silverlight.

crossDomainPolicy.description: The content of crossdomain.xml used by Silverlight.

removeOutputsOnStop.description: The flag indicates if remove LiveOutputs on Stop.

LiveEventActionInput.description: The LiveEvent action input parameter definition.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Live Event.

resourceState.description: The resource state of the Live Event.

vanityUrl.description: The Live Event vanity URL flag.

created.description: The exact time the Live Event was created.

lastModified.description: The exact time the Live Event was last modified.

value.description: The result of the List Live Event operation.

@odata.nextLink.description: Th link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of Live Outputs.

expiration.description: The exact time the authentication key.

ip.description: The IP access control of the StreamingEndpoint.

scaleUnit.description: The scale unit number of the StreamingEndpoint.
scaleUnit.title: ScaleUnit

accessControl.description: The access control definition of the StreamingEndpoint.

customHostNames.description: The custom host names of the StreamingEndpoint

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the StreamingEndpoint.

resourceState.description: The resource state of the StreamingEndpoint.

created.description: The exact time the StreamingEndpoint was created.

lastModified.description: The exact time the StreamingEndpoint was last modified.

value.description: The result of the List StreamingEndpoint operation.

@odata.nextLink.description: Th link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of StreamingEndpoints.

target.description: The target of the error (for example, the name of the property in error).

SubscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionId.description: The unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription.

ApiVersion.description: The Version of the API to be used with the client request.

ResourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

LiveEventName.name: liveEventName
LiveEventName.description: The name of the Live Event.

StreamingResourceAutoStart.name: autoStart
StreamingResourceAutoStart.description: The flag indicates if auto start the Live Event.

LiveOutputName.name: liveOutputName
LiveOutputName.description: The name of the Live Output.
